_comments: This file maps Word controls to data fields or calculated values.
Each control can have a 'type' and 'value' or 'formula'.
Please review each control and specify what it should contain.

items1.description: List of one-time costs/items - there are fields within these fields. Module is the product name, aantal is the ammount, éénmalige setupkost is the material cost, calctotaalsetup is the ammount times the price

items2.description: List of recurring costs/items - here are fields within these fields. Module is the product name, aantal is the ammount, jaarlijks is the material cost, calctotaaljaarlijks is the ammount times the price

calctotaalsetup.description: Calculated total setup costs - this is part of Items1 and is the ammount times the price of the material line

calctotaaljaarlijks.description: Calculated total yearly costs - this is part of Itemd2 and is the ammount times the price of the material line

beschrijving.description: a free description field for the offer

Module.description: the name of the line in the items table

Aantal.description: quantity of given material in items table

Jaarlijks.description: part of an items1 line the price entered into the material field.

Bedrijf.description: Company field - assuming same as company name

Naam.description: Name field - assuming same as contact name

questions: 1. What format should items1 and items2 use? Line by line? Bullet points? Table format? ANSWER: This is in a table and this items1 and items2 should be multiple lines. There are fields in there as mentioned in the fields above here.
2. What should the 'total' field contain? Sum of all costs? Excl VAT? ANSWER: see ansswers above
3. What VAT percentage should be used and what is it calculated on? ANSWER: 21% of the total.
4. What should 'grandtotal' include? Total + VAT? ANSWER: Yes
5. What should go in 'beschrijving' (description)? ANSWER: free field to be added on the page

6. The Module/Aantal/setupkost/Jaarlijks fields appear multiple times - are these table rows for individual cost items? ANSWER: Those are part of the items1 and items2 and thus are differentiated in there.
7. Are there any other calculated fields I'm missing? ANSWER: No
8. Should any fields be left empty or have default values? ANSWER: no
